DOC.brief_summary: Remote (upper arm) ischemic preconditioning in the donor of living donor liver transplanta to ameliorate the effect of reperfusion injury in recipients.
DOC.brief_title: Remote Ischemic Preconditioning in Liver Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Upper arm ischemia will be induced by elevation of NIBP cuff pressure to 200 mm Hg for 5 minutes repeated four times 5 mniutes apart, aiming to decrease the effect of ischemia reperfusion in the graft liver.
DOC.criteria: All candidates for living donor liver transplantation Donors with peripheral vascular disease
